title: Tammy Hembrow gushes over son Wolf, four, and daughter Saskia, three, and talks motherhood
text:
She's the social media influencer who juggles motherhood while running her successful fitness empire.

And on Thursday, Tammy Hembrow took to Instagram gush over her two young children, son Wolf, four, and lookalike daughter Saskia, three.

The 25-year-old Australian personality shared a sweet snap of herself with her two children sitting on her lap, with Tammy saying how motherhood has changed her for the better.

'The deepest love I've ever known': Tammy Hembrow gushed over son Wolf, four, and daughter Saskia, three, on Thursday, as she revealed just how motherhood has changed her for the better

She wrote: 'When you become a mother you no longer belong to yourself.'

'You give everything you have for these tiny humans but they give you so much more in return.'

'My babies you make me stronger, better, more patient. The deepest love I've ever known.'

Not having it! Tammy then hit back at one troll who said she keeps leaving them to 'party in America

Tammy then hit back at one troll who said she keeps leaving them to 'party in America.

'Lol is that why you keep leaving them to party in America?' they wrote.

Tammy hit back, saying: 'Actually, [the] only time I go overseas without them is when I have to for work, and they get quality time with their dad when I do!'

The 25-year-old Gold Coast based model shares her children with ex-fiancé, Reece Hawkins, who is now in a relationship with American model, London Goheen.

Family: The 25-year-old Gold Coast based model shares her children with ex-fiancé, Reece Hawkins, who is now in a relationship with American model, London Goheen

Back in September, Tammy took to her social media to gush about how quickly her children have grown up and how the time 'goes so fast.'

Posing a snap alongside her two children, she wrore 'Sassy's grin is the absolute most,' she wrote, adding: 'Look at my angels.'

Replying to a fan who commented how much they've grown, Tammy replied, saying: 'It goes so fast.'

Another fan said that Wolfie 'looks so grown up,' with Tammy saying: 'My lil (sic) man isn't so lil (sic).'
description: She's the social media influencer who juggles motherhood while running her successful fitness empire.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
